task.title: In Case of a Fire
task.shortdesc: What to do in case there is a fire or the fire alarms go off in Shanks.

context.p: All evacuation routes are posted by the door.

step.cmd: Evacuate if you hear a fire alarm.

substep.cmd: Activate the fire alarm on your way out, if you notive a fire before the alarm sounds.

step.cmd: Assist individuals with disabilities. Do not use elevators.

substep.cmd: Report the locations of those individuals to the emergency personnel if you cannot help them evacuate.
